machine_end_gcode.default_value:
;End GCode by ideagen3D

M104 S0 ;Set nozzle temperature to 0
M140 S0 ;Set Bed temperature to 0

G92 E1 ;Prepare to retract filament
G1 E-1 F300 ;Retract filament
G28 X0 Y0 ;Home X and Y
M84 ;Disable Steppers

machine_start_gcode.default_value:
;Start GCode by ideagen3D

G1 Z15.0 F6000 ;Move the platform down 15mm

;Initialize Temperature
M140 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} ;heat bed and continue
M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} ;heat nozzle and continue
M190 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} ;wait for bed temperature to reach initial layer temperature
M109 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} ;wait for hot end temperature to reach initial layer temperature

G28 M420 S1 ; Home & Enable Bed Levelling

;Prime the extruder
G92 E0
G1 X1 Y280 Z0.2 ;Prepare to Purge
G1 Y20 Z0.2 F1500.0 E15 ;Purge line
G92 E0
